page.title: 14POLICE DOG TRAINING
page.content: The Greater Manchester Constabulary and Lancashire Constabulary use the area regularly for training their dogs in tracking. It is an ideal place because it is not frequented by many people, therefore a dog being introduced to tracking does not become confused with different scents. The dogs set out from a base and are then encouraged to find pre-planted objects, the scent of which they have been given at base. As the dog learns, so the scents get harder to find. Competitions within the different regional forces are popular and so the area is used as a practice ground prior to these events.
